tunnel.description: Please select a gateway from the list.

type.description:
Please enter the connection type we should use for your KNX connection. 
 AUTOMATIC - The integration takes care of the connectivity to your KNX Bus by performing a gateway scan. 
 TUNNELING - The integration will connect to your KNX bus via tunneling. 
 ROUTING - The integration will connect to your KNX bus via routing.

data.local_ip: Local IP of Home Assistant (use 0.0.0.0 for automatic detection)
data.multicast_group: Multicast group used for routing and discovery
data.multicast_port: Multicast port used for routing and discovery
data.state_updater: Globally enable reading states from the KNX Bus
